privacy.title: Privacy & Security

backup.title: Browser Data Backup
backup.subtitle: Backup and restore your data

status.title: Backup Status
status.createFirst: Create your first backup to secure your workflows and settings

info.title: What gets backed up:
info.note: Note: Only one backup file is maintained. New backups overwrite the existing one.

dialog.backupMessage: This will create a backup of your browser data on the server. Any existing backup will be overwritten.
dialog.restoreMessage: This will restore your browser data from the server backup. All current data will be replaced and the page will reload.
dialog.warningMessage: This action cannot be undone. Make sure you have a current backup if needed.

toast.reloadPrompt: Data restored successfully. Reload the page to see changes?
